name: TRAPPED! in a Soap Opera
description:
Evil twins! Estranged lovers! Long-dead relatives come back to life!

Jake Thompson expected twists like that during his day job—after all, he was a mediocre actor on a mediocre soap opera called "Romance and Auditors." He enjoyed the paycheck, but the storylines...well, they all seemed so utterly ridiculous. So contrived. So fake.

Until one day,  when he walked off the set and found himself...still on the set. Only there were no cameras. No lights. And no end to the scenery.

Jake Thompson had found himself...

TRAPPED! IN A SOAP OPERA

Key features:

- A short visual novelette about maintaining appropriate work-life balance.
- Three different storylines, inspired by daytime television!
- Exactly one decision point (but it's a good one)
- A brief, silly respite from the horrorscape that is today's news
- Written by Michael "Arglefumph" Gray, who watches WAY too many soap operas.
